For example, they mention "advanced level of Spanish proficiency" as a desirable qualification, which does not exclude or favour any particular racial group.
text:
Company: Chapman, Mitchell and Wood

Role: Senior Staffing Manager / Division Director

Job Type: Full-time

About Us:
Chapman, Mitchell and Wood is a leading staffing agency dedicated to providing top-notch recruitment services to businesses across various industries. We pride ourselves on our commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Staffing Manager / Division Director to join our team. As a Senior Staffing Manager / Division Director, you will be responsible for leading a team of recruiters, developing business strategies, and building strong relationships with clients.

Responsibilities:

- Manage a team of recruiters to achieve sales targets and goals
- Develop and implement effective business strategies to drive revenue growth
- Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to ensure customer satisfaction
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless service delivery
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to maintain our competitive edge

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Human Resources, or a related field
- Minimum 5 years of experience in staffing or recruitment, with at least 2 years in a management role
- Proven track record of achieving sales targets and goals
- Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities
- Advanced level of Spanish proficiency is desirable

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance
